Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/Maypole
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Washington and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Maypole.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, Chicago, Laramie, Washington and Cicero due to, street blockage near Cicero/Maypole.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute near Stony Island/64th
ShortDescription: 28 buses temp. rrted SB: Stny Island, 64th, Dorchester, Marquette, & Stny Island; NB: Stny Island, Marquette, Woodlawn, 63rd & Stny Island nr Stny Island/64th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near near Stony Island/64th, due to fire department activity.

Southbound buses will operate via Stony Island, 64th, Dorchester, Marquette, & Stony Island.

Northbound buses will operate via Stony Island, Marquette, Woodlawn, 63rd & Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.
